title: Cloud Natural Language - Method: documents.analyzeEntitySentiment
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - Method: documents.analyzeEntitySentiment
- [HTTP request](#body.HTTP_TEMPLATE) 
- [Request body](#body.request_body) - [JSON representation](#body.request_body.SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) 
- [Response body](#body.response_body) - [JSON representation](#body.AnalyzeEntitySentimentResponse.SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) 
- [Authorization scopes](#body.aspect) 
- [Try it!](#try-it) 
Finds entities, similar to ` [documents.analyzeEntities](/natural-language/docs/reference/rest/v1beta2/documents/analyzeEntities#google.cloud.language.v1beta2.LanguageService.AnalyzeEntities) ` in the text and analyzes sentiment associated with each entity and its mentions.

content:
## HTTP request`POST https://language.googleapis.com/v1beta2/documents:analyzeEntitySentiment`
The URL uses [gRPC Transcoding](https://google.aip.dev/127) syntax.
### Request bodyThe request body contains data with the following structure:
| JSON representation               |
|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "document": { object (Document) }, "encodingType": enum (EncodingType) } || Fields  | Fields.1                 |
|:-------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| document  | object (Document) Required. Input document.         |
| encodingType | enum (EncodingType) The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets. |
### Response bodyThe entity-level sentiment analysis response message.
If successful, the response body contains data with the following structure:| JSON representation            |
|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "entities": [ { object (Entity) } ], "language": string } || Fields  | Fields.1                                                 |
|:-----------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| entities[] | object (Entity) The recognized entities in the input document with associated sentiments.                             |
| language | string The language of the text, which will be the same as the language specified in the request or, if not specified, the automatically-detected language. See Document.language field for more details. |
### Authorization scopesRequires one of the following OAuth scopes:- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-language`
- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform`For more information, see the [Authentication Overview](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/) .
